brawlers.name: Shelly
brawlers.about: Shelly's spread-fire shotgun blasts the other team with buckshot. Her Super destroys cover and keeps her opponents at a distance!

main attack.name: Buckshot
main attack.about: Shelly's boomstick fires a wide spread of pellets to a medium range. The more pellets hit, the greater the damage.

super.name: Super shell
super.about: Shelly's Super Shell obliterates both cover and enemies. Any survivors get knocked back.

gadgets.name: Fast Forward
gadgets.about: Shelly dashes forward.

starPowers.name: Band-Aid
starPowers.about: Shelly recovers 1800 health every 20 seconds. Activates when Shelly's health falls below 40%

starPowers.name: Shell Shock
starPowers.about: Super Shell slows down enemies for 3 secs.

brawlers.name: Nita
brawlers.about: Nita sends forth a shockwave, damaging enemies caught in the tremor.

main attack.name: Rupture
main attack.about: Nita sends forth a shockwave, damaging enemies caught in the tremor.

super.name: Overbearing
super.about: Nita summons the spirit of Big Baby Bear to hunt down her enemies.

gadgets.name: Bear Paws
gadgets.about: Stun the enemies close to the bear.

starPowers.name: Bear with Me
starPowers.about: Nita and her bear recover 500 damage when either hits a target.

starPowers.name: Hyper Bear
starPowers.about: The attack speed of the bear is decreased by 50%. The bear's attack also has no warmup and cooldown time.

brawlers.name: Colt
brawlers.about: Colt fires an accurate burst of bullets from his dual revolvers. His Super shreds cover and extends the bullet barrage!

main attack.name: Six-shooters
main attack.about: Colt shoots six straight long-range shots out of his revolvers.

super.name: Bullet storm
super.about: Colt rattles off a massive burst of bullets that shoot extra far and destroy cover.

gadgets.name: Speedloader
gadgets.about: Colt instantly reloads 2 ammo.

starPowers.name: Slick Boots
starPowers.about: Colt's movement speed is increased.

starPowers.name: Magnum Special
starPowers.about: Colt's attack range and bullet speed are increased

brawlers.name: Bull
brawlers.about: Bull deals massive damage up close with his shotgun. For his Super move, he charges through barriers and knocks back enemies!

main attack.name: Double-barrel
main attack.about: Bull's double-barreled shotgun deals heavy damage. It has very short range, so Bull likes to get up close and personal.

super.name: Bulldozer
super.about: Bull puts his head down and bulldozes through opponents and obstacles. He's always been headstrong!

gadgets.name: T-Bone Injector
gadgets.about: Bull instantly recovers 1500 health.

starPowers.name: Tough Guy
starPowers.about: Bull gains a shield which reduces damage by 30% when Bull has less than 40% health.

starPowers.name: Berserker
starPowers.about: Bull's reload speed is increased.

brawlers.name: Jessie
brawlers.about: Jessie fires off an energy orb. After hitting a target, the orb bounces at the next target in range, hitting up to three enemies.

main attack.name: Shock Rifle
main attack.about: Jessie fires off an energy orb. After hitting a target, the orb bounces at the next target in range, hitting up to three enemies.

super.name: Scrappy!
super.about: Jessie deploys a gun turret that automatically shoots at enemies. It's made of 100% recycled materials!

gadgets.name: SparK Plug
gadgets.about: All enemies within close range of Scrappy are slowed down.

starPowers.name: Energize
starPowers.about: Jessie's orbs heal Scrappy for 800 health per hit.

starPowers.name: Shocky
starPowers.about: Scrappy's projectiles bounce when they hit enemies.

brawlers.name: Brock
brawlers.about: Brock fires a long-range, explosive rocket at enemies. His Super is a ballistic rocket barrage that destroys cover!

main attack.name: Rockin' Rocket
main attack.about: Brock lets fly with a single Rockin' Rocket that really goes the distance.

super.name: Rocket Rain
super.about: Brock fires a rocket barrage that takes out enemies and obstacles. He only wants to see you bathing in the Rocket Rain!

gadgets.name: Rocket Laces
gadgets.about: Brock does 500 damage to nearby enemies and jumps over objects

starPowers.name: Incendiary
starPowers.about: 600 damage per second 2 secs

starPowers.name: Rocket No. Four
starPowers.about: Brock can fire a 4th rocket.

brawlers.name: Dynamike
brawlers.about: Dynamike lobs two explosive sticks of dynamite. His Super attack is a whole barrel full of dynamite that blows up cover!

main attack.name: Short Fuse
main attack.about: Mike tosses two sticks of dynamite, passing over any obstacles in the way. The fuses are cut as short as Mike's explosive temper!

super.name: Big Barrel O' Boom
super.about: A big-bada-barrel of dynamite blows up cover. Any surviving enemies get knocked back on impact!

gadgets.name: Fidget Spinner
gadgets.about: Dynamike throws dynamites around him. Each stick deals 700 damage.

starPowers.name: Dynajump
starPowers.about: When Dynamike gets close to the explosion of a dynamite, he will be launched into the air.

starPowers.name: Demolition
starPowers.about: Increase super damage +1000.

brawlers.name: Bo
brawlers.about: Bo fires three explosive arrows toward his targets. His Super ability places a trio of hidden, explosive mines on the ground!

main attack.name: Eagle-eyed
main attack.about: Bo releases a trio of exploding arrows, tearing up enemies like an eagle's talons.

super.name: Catch A Fox
super.about: Bo hides explosive traps in the ground. When triggered by an enemy, the traps explode after a short delay, knocking back and damaging enemies.

gadgets.name: Super Totem
gadgets.about: Bo and allies are able to charge the super without attacking.

starPowers.name: Circling Eagle
starPowers.about: Bo and allies can see enemies in bushes from a greater distance.

starPowers.name: Snare a Bear
starPowers.about: Bo's mines stun enemies for 2 seconds.

brawlers.name: Tick
brawlers.about: Tick is a metal ball of barely controlled excitement and energy - explosive energy! He throws mines, and his Super makes his head detach, seek a target and explode.

main attack.name: Minimines
main attack.about: Tick lobs a cluster of mines that separate before landing. The mines explode on contact with a target, or after a few seconds.

super.name: Headfirst
super.about: Tick detaches and launches his head. After landing, the head hops toward the nearest target and explodes on contact!

gadgets.name: Backup Mine
gadgets.about: Tick dashes forward and drops a back-up mine.

starPowers.name: Well-Oiled
starPowers.about: Tick recovers health 2 seconds faster than normal (after one second).

starPowers.name: Automa-Tick Reload
starPowers.about: Tick has 10% shorter reload time.

brawlers.name: 8-bit
brawlers.about: 8-Bit lumbers along like an arcade cabinet on legs. He shoots Blaster Beams and his Super boosts friendlies' damage!

main attack.name: Blaster Beams
main attack.about: Shoots a burst of Blaster Beams that damage any opponent they hit. The beams have medium range and a slight spread.

super.name: Damage Booster
super.about: Deploys a turret that increases the damage output of all friendly Brawlers in its area of effect.

gadgets.name: Cheat Cartridge
gadgets.about: 8-bit teleports to the booster.

starPowers.name: Extra Life
starPowers.about: 8-bit instantly resurrects with full health, one time.

starPowers.name: Boosted Booster
starPowers.about: The range of the booster is increased.

brawlers.name: Emz
brawlers.about: Emz attacks with blasts of hair spray that deal damage over time, and slows down opponents with her Super.

main attack.name: Spray
main attack.about: Emz gives you a blast of her hair spray! It's strong enough to melt your face.

super.name: Caustic Charisma
super.about: Emz creates a cloud of toxicity around herself, slowing down the movement of enemies and damaging them.

gadgets.name: Friendzoner
gadgets.about: Emz pushes back all enemies into the ideal range for doing her max damage and does 500 damage.

starPowers.name: Bad Karma
starPowers.about: Enemies suffer +20% damage for each consecutive half-second caught in Emz' spray.

starPowers.name: Hype
starPowers.about: Emz recovers 400 health per enemy caught inside her toxic area of effect.

brawlers.name: El Primo
brawlers.about: El Primo throws a flurry of punches at his enemies. His Super is a leaping elbow drop that deals damage to all caught underneath!

main attack.name: Fists of Fury
main attack.about: El Primo fires off a furious flurry of four fiery fists. That's a spicy jalapeno knuckle sandwich!

super.name: Flying Elbow Drop
super.about: Leaping high, El Primo drops an Intergalactic Elbow that knocks around enemies and destroys cover!

gadgets.name: Suplex Supplement
gadgets.about: El Primo throws enemies over his shoulders.

starPowers.name: Meteor Rush
starPowers.about: El Primo gains +25% movement speed for 4 seconds after using his super.

starPowers.name: El Fuego
starPowers.about: El Primo's super does 1200 damage over 4 seconds

brawlers.name: Barley
brawlers.about: Barley attacks by lobbing bottles at enemies, doing splash damage. His Super is a huge barrage of burning bottles!

main attack.name: Undiluted
main attack.about: Barley lobs a bottle, breaking it on the ground. Enemies take damage from the splash, and more damage over time if they stay in the puddle.

super.name: Last Call!
super.about: Barley hurls a flurry of fiery bottles, covering a huge area in flames. This one's on the house!

gadgets.name: Sticky Syrup Mixer
gadgets.about: Barley releases a puddle of sticky syrup. Enemies caught in the syrup are slowed down.

starPowers.name: Medical Use
starPowers.about: Barley recovers 400 health per attack.

starPowers.name: Extra Noxious
starPowers.about: Barley's attack does +140 damage.

brawlers.name: Poco
brawlers.about: Poco fires damaging sound waves at enemies. His Super can heal both Poco himself and his teammates!

main attack.name: Power Chord
main attack.about: Poco strums his guitarr√≥n, sending forward bone-jarring sound waves. Enemies hit by the waves take damage.

super.name: Encore
super.about: Poco heals himself and all friends he can reach with his uplifting melody. Does not affect enemies.

gadgets.name: Tuning Fork
gadgets.about: Poco and his allies close to him recover 2500 health over 5 seconds

starPowers.name: Da Capo!
starPowers.about: Poco heals allies 700 hp per attack.

starPowers.name: Screching Solo
starPowers.about: Poco's super does 800 damage.

brawlers.name: Rosa
brawlers.about: This boxing botanist will plant her feet and go toe to toe! Her Super gives her tough, vegan protective gear.

main attack.name: Hands of Stone
main attack.about: Rosa throws a flurry of powerful punches with perfect technique!

super.name: Strong Stuff
super.about: Rosa gets a second skin of tough vine for 3 seconds, decreasing all damage received by 70% for the duration.

gadgets.name: Grow Light
gadgets.about: Rosa plants a bush.

starPowers.name: Plant Life
starPowers.about: Rosa recovers 200 hp per second while inside a bush.

starPowers.name: Thorny Gloves
starPowers.about: Rosa does +220 damage during her super.

brawlers.about: Shelly's spread-fire shotgun blasts the other team with buckshot. Her Super destroys cover and keeps her opponents at a distance!

main attack.name: Buckshot
main attack.about: Shelly's boomstick fires a wide spread of pellets to a medium range. The more pellets hit, the greater the damage.

super.name: Super shell
super.about: Shelly's Super Shell obliterates both cover and enemies. Any survivors get knocked back.

gadgets.name: Fast Forward
gadgets.about: Shelly dashes forward.

starPowers.name: Band-Aid
starPowers.about: Shelly recovers 1800 health every 20 seconds. Activates when Shelly's health falls below 40%

starPowers.name: Shell Shock
starPowers.about: Super Shell slows down enemies for 3 secs.
